import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; function Show() { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3001/showapi/show') .then(users => setUsers(users.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) axios.defaults.withCredentials = true; const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const openModal = () => setIsModalOpen(true); const closeModal = () => setIsModalOpen(false); return ( <>

Student's Data

Date Year Semester Section Action
19/04/2001 III V B
{/* Modal */} {isModalOpen && (
e.stopPropagation()}>

Student Attendance

{ users.map(user => { return <> })}
Mode Boys Girls
Hostel {user.hBoys} {user.hGirls}
Day-Scholar {user.cbBoys} {user.cbGirls}
Out-Bus {user.obBoys} {user.obGirls}
Total Strength {user.total}
Total Present {}
Total Absent 65
% Present 65
)} ) } export default Show
